channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Avoid drama with your will by adding this to your estate plan
item.description: The stakes are high for heirs who expect a hefty inheritance

item.title: ‘It’s been a scary ride’: My family has $800K in stocks. We lost 2 years of market gains in a few weeks. Do we sell — or buy?
item.description: “I’m considering encouraging my family to liquidate part of their real-estate holdings to further invest in equities.”

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Oil edges higher as tighter U.S. sanctions on Iran, Russia may disrupt global supplies
item.description: Oil futures inched higher on Friday, as news of tighter U.S. sanctions on Iran and Russia had the potential to disrupt global crude supplies.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: ‘In their last days, our parents changed their will’: They left me $250,000, but gave my sister $1 million. What should I do?
item.description: “How many people maintain a relationship with their siblings after their parents died?”

item.title: This could be Tesla’s next plan to recoup China market share
item.description: Tesla has lost share to Chinese competitors, while Elon Musk’s political activities have led to steep declines in Tesla sales in Europe.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...
